show_name: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day (movie)
other_title: Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Boku-tachi wa Mada Shiranai. (Japanese)
anohana: La Flor Que Vimos Ese Día - La Película (Spanish)
あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。 (Japanese)
plot: A year has passed since Menma's ghostly return to the Super Peace Busters. Although the time they spent together during that summer was short, the five members reminisce about what happened as they each write a letter to their lost friend.
